alert.note: Alert for Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 4:02PM EDT until August 06 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HART COUNTY... At 301 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were from 6 miles south of Munfordville to 12 miles southwest of Greensburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Horse Cave, Winesap, Northtown, Legrande, Bear Wallow, Forestville, Rowletts, Tom Johns Crossing, Uno, and Logsdon Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
